thread.section_title: WSJ. Magazine – Fashion, Travel, Design, Art, Culture, Food, Living
thread.title: The Best Neighborhood in Mexico City is an Unexpected One

author: Brooke Porter Katz
title: The Best Neighborhood in Mexico City is an Unexpected One
text:
Amaya The modern Mexican menu changes often at this casual spot, but one constant is the all-natural wine list that includes chef Jair Téllez’s own Bichi label. amayamexico.com
Casa Prim Hotel Boutique With 24 individually designed rooms, this new property features a towering green wall and a rooftop restaurant. casaprim.mx
Cicatriz
